description: '''Armaan Malik''' (born 22 July 1995) is an Indian  [[playback singer]], songwriter, record producer, voice-over artist, and [[actor]]. He is known for his singing in multiple Indian languages. He is the brother of music composer [[Amaal Mallik]]. Previously represented by [[Universal Music India]] and [[T-Series (company)|T-Series]], he is now represented by [[Arista Records]]. He also owns a record label called [[Independent record label|Always Music Global]] in partnership with [[Warner Music Group|Warner Music India]]. His first on-screen appearance was in the film ''[[Kaccha Limboo]]'' in 2011.
